p.k: Bon Voyage / Mayhem in Mascot / Screamcatcher / Vote Zombozo! / Animorphosis Aboard the SS Pettigrew, Ben must not only battle seasickness but Steam Smythe, who looks to use his mechanical creatures to sink the steamship's modern replacement. / After their attempt to get a photo with every storefront mascot is foiled, Ben and Gwen sneak out at night to get their photo with the wooden bear totem known as "Yawk". / The malevolent magician Hex uses a dream catcher to bring Ben's fears to life and transports them both to a nightmarish dreamscape. / When the Rustbucket must have a tune-up in the same town as Zombozo's latest campaign trail stop, Ben discovers the clown is using his speeches to hypnotise and rob the town. / As the Tennyson trio dig up dinosaur fossils in the Badlands, Ben is unaware that Vilgax and Dr. Amino have teamed up to steal alien DNA from within the Omnitrix.
